title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, copy, delete, and create models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, embeddings, and chat interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store; ingest PDFs, query via CLI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama; use local LLMs as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI for Ollama with Tailwind, Markdown support, and mobile layout.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack for Ollama with CUDA runtime and optional WebUI service.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, Phi, etc.; ready to pull.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for DM and channel queries; streaming responses to threads.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama chat/completions inside workflows; supports templates and credentials.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate for Ollama; async client, streaming, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# SDK for Ollama; .NET 6+, async enumerable streams, dependency injection.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.
